fields.name: default
fields.xsd_text:
<xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema">
  <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="LC_Base">
    <xs:sequence>
      <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="name" type="xs:string" />
      <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="description" type="xs:string" />
    </xs:sequence>
	<xs:attribute name="id" type="xs:string" use="required" />
  <xs:attribute name="uuid" type="xs:string" use="required" />
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="LC_List">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Base" />
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="LC_Container">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_List" />
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:element name="LC_Legend" type="LC_Legend" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_Legend">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Container">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="elements">
            <xs:complexType>
              <xs:sequence>
                <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="LC_LandCoverClass" type="LC_LandCoverClass" />
              </xs:sequence>
            </xs:complexType>
          </xs:element>		
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="author" type="xs:string" />
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="LC_MixedClasses" type="LC_MixedClasses" />
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="views">
            <xs:complexType>
              <xs:sequence>
                <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="LC_LandCoverClassView" type="LC_LandCoverClassView" />
              </xs:sequence>
            </xs:complexType>
          </xs:element>
        </xs:sequence>
        <xs:attribute name="lccs_sort" type="xs:boolean" />
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:element name="LC_MixedClasses" type="LC_MixedClasses" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_MixedClasses">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Container">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="elements">
            <xs:complexType>
              <xs:sequence>
                <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="LC_MixedClass" type="LC_MixedClass" />
              </xs:sequence>
            </xs:complexType>
          </xs:element>
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="LC_MixedClass">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Base">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="map_code" type="xs:string" />
        </xs:sequence>
        <xs:attribute name="dominant" type="xs:string" />
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:element name="LC_AND_MixedClass" type="LC_AND_MixedClass" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_AND_MixedClass">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_MixedClass">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="elements">
            <xs:complexType>
              <xs:sequence>
                <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="2" name="LandCoverClass">
                  <xs:complexType>
                    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
                      <xs:extension base="PercentageRange">
                        <xs:attribute name="uuid" type="xs:string" />
                      </xs:extension>
                    </xs:complexContent>
                  </xs:complexType>
                </xs:element>
              </xs:sequence>
            </xs:complexType>
          </xs:element>
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:complexType name="PercentageRange">
    <xs:attribute name="min">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal">
          <xs:minInclusive value="0.0" />
          <xs:maxInclusive value="100.0" />
        </xs:restriction>
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
    <xs:attribute name="max">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal">
          <xs:minInclusive value="0.0" />
          <xs:maxInclusive value="100.0" />
        </xs:restriction>
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:complexType name="height">
    <xs:attribute name="min">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal" />
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
    <xs:attribute name="max">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal" />
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:complexType name="depth">
    <xs:attribute name="min">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal" />
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
    <xs:attribute name="max">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal" />
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:complexType name ="seasonal_variation_persistence">
    <xs:attribute name="min">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:integer" />
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
    <xs:attribute name="max">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:integer" />
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:element name="LC_OR_MixedClass" type="LC_OR_MixedClass" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_OR_MixedClass">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_MixedClass">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="elements">
            <xs:complexType>
              <xs:sequence>
                <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="2" name="LandCoverClass">
                  <xs:complexType>
                    <xs:simpleContent>
                      <xs:extension base="ORMixedClassItemTypeEnum">
                        <xs:attribute name="uuid" type="xs:string" />
                      </xs:extension>
                    </xs:simpleContent>
                  </xs:complexType>
                </xs:element>
              </xs:sequence>
            </xs:complexType>
          </xs:element>
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:simpleType name="ORMixedClassItemTypeEnum">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:enumeration value="Dominant" />
      <xs:enumeration value="Present" />
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpleType>
  <xs:element name="LC_LandCoverClass" type="LC_LandCoverClass" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_LandCoverClass">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Container">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="map_code" type="xs:string" />
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="elements">
            <xs:complexType>
              <xs:sequence>
                <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="LC_Characteristic" type="LC_ClassCharacteristic" />
                <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="LC_HorizontalPattern" type="LC_HorizontalPattern" />
              </xs:sequence>
            </xs:complexType>
          </xs:element>
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="LC_Characteristic">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Container">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="elements">
            <xs:complexType>
              <xs:sequence>
                <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="LC_Characteristic" type="LC_Characteristic" />
              </xs:sequence>
            </xs:complexType>
          </xs:element>
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="LC_ClassCharacteristic">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Characteristic" />
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:element name="LC_Climate" type="LC_Climate" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_Climate">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_ClassCharacteristic">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="termal_zone" type="ClimateTermalZoneEnum" />
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="length_of_growing_period" type="ClimateLengthOfGrowingPeriodEnum" />
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:simpleType name="ClimateTermalZoneEnum">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:whiteSpace value="replace" />
      <xs:pattern value=".*|Tropics|Subtropics Summer Rainfall|Subtropics Winter Rainfall|Temperate Oceanic|Temperate Continental|Boreal Oceanic|Boreal Continental|Polar Arctic" />
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpleType>
  <xs:simpleType name="ClimateLengthOfGrowingPeriodEnum">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:whiteSpace value="replace" />
      <xs:pattern value=".*|Hyperarid|Arid|Dry Semi-arid|Moist Semi-arid|Subhumid|Humid|Perhumid" />
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpleType>
  <xs:element name="LC_LandForm" type="LC_LandForm" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_LandForm">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_ClassCharacteristic">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="type" type="LandFormTypesEnum" />
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="slope_class_type" type="SlopeClassesEnum" />
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:simpleType name="LandFormTypesEnum">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:whiteSpace value="replace" />
      <xs:pattern value=".*|Level Land|Sloping Land|Steep Land|Land with Composite Landforms|Plain|Plateau|Depression|Low-Gradient Footslope|Valley Floor|Medium-Gradient Mountain|Medium-Gradient Hill|Medium-Gradient Escarpment Zone|Ridges|Mountainous Highland|Dissected Plain|High-Gradient Mountain|High-Gradient Hill|High-Gradient Escarpment Zone|High-Gradient Valleys|Valley|Narrow Plateau|Major Depression" />
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpleType>
  <xs:simpleType name="SlopeClassesEnum">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:whiteSpace value="replace" />
      <xs:pattern value=".*|Flat to Almost Flat|Gently Undulating to Undulating|Rolling|Hilly|Steeply Dissected to Mountainous" />
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpleType>
  <xs:element name="LC_GeographicalAspects" type="LC_GeographicalAspects" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_GeographicalAspects">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_ClassCharacteristic">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="type" type="GeoTypeEnum" />
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:simpleType name="GeoTypeEnum">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:whiteSpace value="replace" />
      <xs:pattern value=".*|Wady|Sabka|Shore|Beach|Bay|Estuary" />
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpleType>
  <xs:element name="LC_TopographicalAspects" type="LC_TopographicalAspects" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_TopographicalAspects">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_ClassCharacteristic">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="altitude">
            <xs:complexType>
              <xs:attribute name="min">
                <xs:simpleType>
                  <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal" />
                </xs:simpleType>
              </xs:attribute>
              <xs:attribute name="max">
                <xs:simpleType>
                  <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal" />
                </xs:simpleType>
              </xs:attribute>
            </xs:complexType>
          </xs:element>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="slope_exposition" type="SlopeExpositionEnum" />
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="slope" type="PercentageRange" />
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:simpleType name="SlopeExpositionEnum">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:whiteSpace value="replace" />
      <xs:pattern value=".*|North|South|East|West" />
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpleType>
  <xs:element name="LC_SurfaceCharacteristics" type="LC_SurfaceCharacteristics" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_SurfaceCharacteristics">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_ClassCharacteristic" />
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:element name="LC_ConsolidatedSurfaceCharacteristics" type="LC_ConsolidatedSurfaceCharacteristics" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_ConsolidatedSurfaceCharacteristics">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_SurfaceCharacteristics">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="rock_type" type="RockTypesEnum" />
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="rock_age_type" type="RockAgeTypesEnum" />
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:simpleType name="RockTypesEnum">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:whiteSpace value="replace" />
      <xs:pattern value=".*|Igneous Rock|Sedimentary Rock|Metamorphic Rock|Igneous Plutonic Rock|Igneous Hypabyssal Rock|Igneous Volcanic Rock|Pyroclastic Rock|Unconsolidated Clastic Sedimentary Rock|Consolidated Clastic Siliceous Sedimentary Rock|Calcareous Rock|Evaporite|Organic Rock|Residual Rock|Contact Metamorphic Rock|Cataclastic Metamorphic Rock|Regional Metamorphic Rock|Granite|Granodiorite|Quartz Diorite|Syenite|Monzonite|Diorite|Gabbro|Foidic Plutonic Rock|Ultramafic Plutonic Rock|Aplite|Pegmatite|Porphyry|Dolerite/Diabase|Rhyolite|Dacite|Trachyte|Latite|Andesite|Basalt|Phonolite|Tephrite|Ash|Lapilli|Scoria|Tuff|Ignimbrite|Lahar|Agglomerate|Clay|Silt|Sand|Gravel|Loess|Loam|Colluvium|Shells|Mudstone|Siltstone|Shale|Quartzarenite|LithicArenite|Feldspathic Arenite Arkose|Graywacke|Conglomerate|Breccia|Marl|Calcilutite|Calcarenite|Calcirudite|Algal/Reefal Limestone|Travertine|Tufa|Dolomite|Gypsum|Halite|Peat|Lignite|Coal|Tar|Laterite|Bauxite|Kaolin|Hornfels|Spotted Slate|Skarn|Cataclastic Breccia|Mylonite|Slate|Schist|Gneiss|Migmatite|Granulite|Eclogite|Quartzite|Marble|Serpentinite" />
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpleType>
  <xs:simpleType name="RockAgeTypesEnum">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:whiteSpace value="replace" />
      <xs:pattern value=".*|Quaternary|Tertiary|Mesozoic|Paleozoic|Precambrian|Holocene|Pleistocene|Pliocene|Miocene|Oligocene|Eocene|Paleocene|Cretaceous|Jurassic|Triassic|Permian|Carboniferous|Devonian|Silurian|Ordovician|Cambrian|Late Pleistocene|Middle Pleistocene|Early Pleistocene" />
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpleType>
  <xs:element name="LC_UnconsolidatedSurfaceCharacteristics" type="LC_UnconsolidatedSurfaceCharacteristics" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_UnconsolidatedSurfaceCharacteristics">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_SurfaceCharacteristics">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="erosion_type" type="ErosionTypeEnum" />
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="soil_type" type="SoilTypesEnum" />
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:simpleType name="ErosionTypeEnum">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:whiteSpace value="replace" />
      <xs:pattern value=".*|Water Erosion|Water Erosion Sheet|Water Erosion Rill|Water Erosion Gully|Wind Erosion|Ice Erosion|Mass Movement" />
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpleType>
  <xs:simpleType name="SoilTypesEnum">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:whiteSpace value="replace" />
      <xs:pattern value=".*|Acrisols|Alisols|Andosols|Anthrosols|Arenosols|Calcisols|Cambisols|Chernozems|Ferralsols|Fluvisols|Gleysols|Greyzems|Gypsisols|Histosols|Kastanozems|Leptosols|Lixisols|Luvisols|Nitisols|Phaezems|Planosols|Plinthosols|Podzols|Podzoluvisols|Regosols|Solonchaks|Solonetz|Vertisols" />
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpleType>
  <xs:element name="LC_HorizontalPattern" type="LC_HorizontalPattern" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_HorizontalPattern">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Container">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="elements">
            <xs:complexType>
              <xs:sequence>
                <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="LC_Stratum" type="LC_Stratum" />
              </xs:sequence>
            </xs:complexType>
          </xs:element>		
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="type" type="xs:string" />
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="cover" type="PercentageRange" />
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="occurance" type="PercentageRange" />
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:element name="LC_Stratum" type="LC_Stratum" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_Stratum">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Container">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="elements">
            <xs:complexType>
              <xs:sequence>
                <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="LC_LandCoverElement" type="LC_LandCoverElement" />
              </xs:sequence>
            </xs:complexType>
          </xs:element>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="presence_type" type="StratumTypeEnum" />
        </xs:sequence>
        <xs:attribute name="ontop" type="xs:string" />
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:simpleType name="StratumTypeEnum">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:enumeration value="Mandatory" />
      <xs:enumeration value="Optional" />
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpleType>
  <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="LC_LandCoverElement">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Container">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="elements">
            <xs:complexType>
              <xs:sequence>
                <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="LC_Characteristic" type="LC_ElementCharacteristic" />
              </xs:sequence>
            </xs:complexType>
          </xs:element>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="sequential_temporal_relationship">
            <xs:complexType>
              <xs:sequence>
                <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="type" type="SeqTemporalRelationshipTypeEnum" />
                <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="length">
                  <xs:complexType>
                    <xs:attribute name="min">
                      <xs:simpleType>
                        <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal" />
                      </xs:simpleType>
                    </xs:attribute>
                    <xs:attribute name="max">
                      <xs:simpleType>
                        <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal" />
                      </xs:simpleType>
                    </xs:attribute>
                  </xs:complexType>
                </xs:element>
              </xs:sequence>
            </xs:complexType>
          </xs:element>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="presence_type" type="ElementPresenceTypeEnum" />
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="cover" type="PercentageRange" />
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="portioning" type="PercentageRange" />
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:simpleType name="ElementPresenceTypeEnum">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:enumeration value="Mandatory" />
      <xs:enumeration value="Optional" />
      <xs:enumeration value="Exclusive" />
      <xs:enumeration value="Temporal Sequence Depending" />
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpleType>
  <xs:simpleType name="SeqTemporalRelationshipTypeEnum">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:enumeration value="Sequential Same Year" />
      <xs:enumeration value="Sequential Other Year" />
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpleType>
  <xs:element name="LC_Vegetation" type="LC_Vegetation" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_Vegetation">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_LandCoverElement" />
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:element name="LC_GrowthForms" type="LC_GrowthForms" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_GrowthForms">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Vegetation" />
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:element name="LC_WoodyGrowthForms" type="LC_WoodyGrowthForms" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_WoodyGrowthForms">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_GrowthForms">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="height" type ="height" />
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="depth" type ="depth" />
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="LC_WoodyGrowthLeafPhenology" type="LC_WoodyGrowthLeafPhenology" />
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="LC_WoodyGrowthLeafType" type="LC_WoodyGrowthLeafType" />
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:element name="LC_WoodyGrowthLeafPhenology" type="LC_WoodyGrowthLeafPhenology"/>
  <xs:complexType name="LC_WoodyGrowthLeafPhenology">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Container">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="elements">
            <xs:complexType>
              <xs:sequence>
                <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="LC_WoodyLeafPhenology" type="LC_WoodyLeafPhenology"/>
              </xs:sequence>
            </xs:complexType>
          </xs:element>
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="LC_Element">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Base"/>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:element name="LC_WoodyLeafPhenology" type="LC_WoodyLeafPhenology"/>
  <xs:complexType name="LC_WoodyLeafPhenology">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Element">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="percentage" type="PercentageRange"/>
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:element name="LC_Evergreen" type="LC_Evergreen"/>
  <xs:complexType name="LC_Evergreen">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_WoodyLeafPhenology"/>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:element name="LC_WoodyGrowthLeafType" type="LC_WoodyGrowthLeafType"/>
  <xs:complexType name="LC_WoodyGrowthLeafType">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">

              </xs:attribute>
              <xs:attribute name="max">
                <xs:simpleType>
                  <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/>
                </xs:simpleType>
              </xs:attribute>
            </xs:complexType>
          </xs:element>
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>

  <xs:element name="LC_WaterBody" type="LC_WaterBody" />

          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="position" type="WaterBodyPositionsEnum" />

  <xs:element name="LC_TerrestrialIce" type="LC_TerrestrialIce" />

  <xs:element name="LC_FloatingIce" type="LC_FloatingIce" />

      <xs:extension base="LC_Ice" />

  <xs:element name="LC_Permafrost" type="LC_Permafrost" />

  <xs:complexType name="LC_LandCoverClassView">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_List">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="LC_LandCoverClassView" type="LC_LandCoverClassView" />
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="elements">
            <xs:complexType>
              <xs:sequence>
                <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="1" name="LC_LandCoverClass" type="xs:string" />
              </xs:sequence>

        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>

  <xs:element name="LC_UserDefinedCharacteristic" type="LC_UserDefinedCharacteristic" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_UserDefinedCharacteristic">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Characteristic">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="userid" type="xs:string"/>

      </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:element name="LC_UserDefinedElementCharacteristic" type="LC_UserDefinedElementCharacteristic" />
  <xs:complexType name="LC_UserDefinedElementCharacteristic">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_ElementCharacteristic">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="userid" type="xs:string"/>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="LC_Property" type ="LC_Property">
        </xs:element>
      </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:element name="LC_UserDefinedClassCharacteristic" type="LC_UserDefinedClassCharacteristic" />

      </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>

  <xs:complexType name="range">
    <xs:attribute name="min">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal" />
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
    <xs:attribute name="max">
      <xs:simpleType>
        <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal" />
      </xs:simpleType>
    </xs:attribute>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="LC_Property">
    <xs:attribute name="name" type="xs:string" use="required" />
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:complexType name="LC_PropertyDouble">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Property">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="value" type ="xs:decimal" />
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:complexType name="LC_PropertyInteger">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Property">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="value" type ="xs:int" />
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:complexType name="LC_PropertyString">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Property">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="value" type ="xs:string" />
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:complexType name="LC_PropertyRange">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_Property">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="1" name="value" type ="range" />
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
    <xs:element name="LC_WaterBodyAndAssociatedSurface" type="LC_WaterBodyAndAssociatedSurface"/>
    <xs:complexType name="LC_WaterBodyAndAssociatedSurface">
        <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
            <xs:extension base="LC_AbioticSurface">
                <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="height">
                        <xs:complexType>
                            <xs:attribute name="min">
                                <xs:simpleType>
                                    <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/>
                                </xs:simpleType>
                            </xs:attribute>
                            <xs:attribute name="max">
                                <xs:simpleType>
                                    <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/>
                                </xs:simpleType>
                            </xs:attribute>
                        </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="depth">
                        <xs:complexType>
                            <xs:attribute name="min">
                                <xs:simpleType>
                                    <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/>
                                </xs:simpleType>
                            </xs:attribute>
                            <xs:attribute name="max">
                                <xs:simpleType>
                                    <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/>
                                </xs:simpleType>
                            </xs:attribute>
                        </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="periodic_variation" type="LC_PeriodicVariations"/>
                </xs:sequence>
            </xs:extension>
        </xs:complexContent>
    </xs:complexType>
    <xs:element name="LC_PeriodicVariations" type="LC_PeriodicVariations"/>
    <xs:complexType name="LC_PeriodicVariations">
        <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
            <xs:extension base="LC_Container">
                <xs:sequence>
                    <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="elements">
                        <xs:complexType>
                            <xs:sequence>
                                <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="LC_PeriodicVariation" type="LC_PeriodicVariation"/>
                            </xs:sequence>
                        </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                </xs:sequence>
            </xs:extension>
        </xs:complexContent>
    </xs:complexType>
    <xs:element name="LC_PeriodicVariation" type="LC_PeriodicVariation"/>
    <xs:complexType name="LC_PeriodicVariation">
        <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
            <xs:extension base="LC_Element">
                <xs:sequence>
                  <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="persistence_units" type="PersistenceUnitsEnum"/>
                  <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="period_type" type="PeriodVariationTypeEnum"/>
                  <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="persistence_period">
                        <xs:complexType>
                            <xs:attribute name="min">
                                <xs:simpleType>
                                    <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/>
                                </xs:simpleType>
                            </xs:attribute>
                            <xs:attribute name="max">
                                <xs:simpleType>
                                    <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"/>
                                </xs:simpleType>
                            </xs:attribute>
                        </xs:complexType>
                    </xs:element>
                    <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="period_description" type="xs:string"/>
                </xs:sequence>
            </xs:extension>
        </xs:complexContent>
    </xs:complexType>
    <xs:simpleType name="PeriodVariationTypeEnum">
        <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
            <xs:whiteSpace value="replace"/>
            <xs:pattern value=".*|Daily|Tidal|Atmospheric"/>
        </xs:restriction>
    </xs:simpleType>
    <xs:simpleType name="PersistenceUnitsEnum">
        <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
            <xs:whiteSpace value="replace"/>
            <xs:pattern value=".*|Years|Months|Weeks|Days|Hours|Minutes"/>
        </xs:restriction>
    </xs:simpleType>
    <xs:element name="LC_WaterAndAssociatedSurfacesCharacteristic" type="LC_WaterAndAssociatedSurfacesCharacteristic"/>
    <xs:complexType name="LC_WaterAndAssociatedSurfacesCharacteristic">
        <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
            <xs:extension base="LC_ElementCharacteristic"/>
        </xs:complexContent>
    </xs:complexType>
  <xs:element name="LC_WaterChemistry" type="LC_WaterChemistry"/>
  <xs:complexType name="LC_WaterChemistry">
    <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
      <xs:extension base="LC_WaterAndAssociatedSurfacesCharacteristic">
        <xs:sequence>
          <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="nutrient_level" type="NutrientLevelEnum"/>
        </xs:sequence>
      </xs:extension>
    </xs:complexContent>
  </xs:complexType>
  <xs:simpleType name="NutrientLevelEnum">
    <xs:restriction base="xs:string">
      <xs:whiteSpace value="replace"/>
      <xs:pattern value=".*|Oligotrophic|Mesotrophic|Eutrophic"/>
    </xs:restriction>
  </xs:simpleType>
  <xs:element name="LC_VegetationDamage" type="LC_VegetationDamage"/>
   <xs:complexType name="LC_VegetationDamage">
      <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
         <xs:extension base="LC_GrowthFormCharacteristic">
            <xs:sequence>
               <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="percentage" type="PercentageRange"/>
               <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="damage_type" type="xs:string"/>
            </xs:sequence>
         </xs:extension>
      </xs:complexContent>
   </xs:complexType>
   <xs:element name="LC_ArtificialSurfaceDamage" type="LC_ArtificialSurfaceDamage"/>
   <xs:complexType name="LC_ArtificialSurfaceDamage">
      <xs:complexContent mixed="false">
         <xs:extension base="LC_ArtificialSurfaceCharacteristic">
            <xs:sequence>
               <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="percentage" type="PercentageRange"/>
               <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="damage_type" type="xs:string"/>
            </xs:sequence>
         </xs:extension>
      </xs:complexContent>
   </xs:complexType>
</xs:schema>

fields.xml_text:
<LC_Legend xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" id="1" lccs_sort="0" uuid="b654cba0-f684-11de-8d21-e06995627ffe" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="LandUseSRDI.xsd" xsi:type="LC_Legend">
   <name>SRDI_2004</name>
   <description>Describe the legend</description>
   <elements>
      <LC_LandCoverClass id="3" uuid="74952bf0-f685-11de-8d21-e06995627ffe" xsi:type="LC_LandCoverClass">
         <name>Sal</name>
         <description>Describe the land cover class</description>
         <map_code>21</map_code>
         <elements>
            <LC_Characteristic id="14" uuid="b0a53ef5-50f6-11de-bcd7-000cf147c442" xsi:type="LC_TopographicalAspects">
               <name>Topographical Aspects</name>
               <description>Describe the topographical aspects</description>
            </LC_Characteristic>
            <LC_HorizontalPattern id="4" uuid="a0a6d700-f687-11de-8d21-e06995627ffe" xsi:type="LC_HorizontalPattern">
               <name>Horizontal Pattern 1</name>
               <description>Describe the horizontal pattern</description>
               <elements>
                  <LC_Stratum id="5" ontop="0" uuid="a37cda60-f687-11de-8d21-e06995627ffe" xsi:type="LC_Stratum">
                     <name>Stratum 1</name>
                     <description>Vegetation 1</description>
                     <elements>
                        <LC_LandCoverElement id="6" uuid="ac039f70-f687-11de-8d21-e06995627ffe" xsi:type="LC_Trees">
                           <name>Trees</name>
                           <description>Describe a vegetation element of trees type</description>
                           <elements>
                              <LC_Characteristic id="7" uuid="27a47286-43af-11de-bbd4-000cf147c442" xsi:type="LC_NaturalOrSeminaturalVegetation">
                                 <name>Natural Or Seminatural Vegetation</name>
                                 <description>Describe the natural or seminatural vegetation</description>
                              </LC_Characteristic>
                              <LC_Characteristic id="8" uuid="4d04fb40-f68c-11de-8d21-e06995627ffe" xsi:type="LC_UnevenAge">
                                 <name>Uneven Age</name>
                                 <description>Describe an uneven-age growth form</description>
                              </LC_Characteristic>
                           </elements>
                           <presence_type>Mandatory</presence_type>
                           <portioning max="100.0" min="100.0"/>
                           <cover max="75.0" min="60.0"/>
                           <LC_WoodyGrowthLeafPhenology id="B" uuid="e3aec874-3572-11de-a238-000cf147c442" xsi:type="LC_WoodyGrowthLeafPhenology">
                              <name>Woody Growth Leaf Phenology</name>
                              <description>Contains the elements of Woody Growth Leaf Phenology</description>
                              <elements>
                                 <LC_WoodyLeafPhenology id="C" uuid="6fa91270-f688-11de-8d21-e06995627ffe" xsi:type="LC_Deciduous">
                                    <name>Deciduous</name>
                                    <description>Describe a Deciduous leaf phenology element</description>
                                 </LC_WoodyLeafPhenology>
                              </elements>
                           </LC_WoodyGrowthLeafPhenology>
                           <LC_WoodyGrowthLeafType id="9" uuid="e3aec875-3572-11de-a238-000cf147c442" xsi:type="LC_WoodyGrowthLeafType">
                              <name>Woody Growth Leaf Type</name>
                              <description>Contains the elements of Woody Growth Leaf Type</description>
                              <elements>
                                 <LC_WoodyLeafType id="A" uuid="7e25b880-f688-11de-8d21-e06995627ffe" xsi:type="LC_Broadleaved">
                                    <name>Broadleaved</name>
                                    <description>Describe a Broadleaved type element</description>
                                 </LC_WoodyLeafType>
                              </elements>
                           </LC_WoodyGrowthLeafType>
                           <height max="14.0" min="7.0"/>
                        </LC_LandCoverElement>
                     </elements>
                     <presence_type>Mandatory</presence_type>
                  </LC_Stratum>
                  <LC_Stratum id="D" ontop="0" uuid="859e2ff0-f68a-11de-8d21-e06995627ffe" xsi:type="LC_Stratum">
                     <name>Stratum 2</name>
                     <description>Vegetation 2</description>
                     <elements>
                        <LC_LandCoverElement id="E" uuid="89c3bdc0-f68a-11de-8d21-e06995627ffe" xsi:type="LC_Shrubs">
                           <name>Shrubs</name>
                           <description>Describe a vegetation element of shrubs type</description>
                           <elements>
                              <LC_Characteristic id="13" uuid="27a47286-43af-11de-bbd4-000cf147c442" xsi:type="LC_NaturalOrSeminaturalVegetation">
                                 <name>Natural Or Seminatural Vegetation</name>
                                 <description>Describe the natural or seminatural vegetation</description>
                              </LC_Characteristic>
                           </elements>
                           <presence_type>Mandatory</presence_type>
                           <portioning max="100.0" min="100.0"/>
                           <cover max="60.0" min="40.0"/>
                           <LC_WoodyGrowthLeafPhenology id="11" uuid="e3aec874-3572-11de-a238-000cf147c442" xsi:type="LC_WoodyGrowthLeafPhenology">
                              <name>Woody Growth Leaf Phenology</name>
                              <description>Contains the elements of Woody Growth Leaf Phenology</description>
                              <elements>
                                 <LC_WoodyLeafPhenology id="12" uuid="d9aa4cf0-f68a-11de-8d21-e06995627ffe" xsi:type="LC_Deciduous">
                                    <name>Deciduous</name>
                                    <description>Describe a Deciduous leaf phenology element</description>
                                 </LC_WoodyLeafPhenology>
                              </elements>
                           </LC_WoodyGrowthLeafPhenology>
                           <LC_WoodyGrowthLeafType id="F" uuid="e3aec875-3572-11de-a238-000cf147c442" xsi:type="LC_WoodyGrowthLeafType">
                              <name>Woody Growth Leaf Type</name>
                              <description>Contains the elements of Woody Growth Leaf Type</description>
                              <elements>
                                 <LC_WoodyLeafType id="10" uuid="e8c66750-f68a-11de-8d21-e06995627ffe" xsi:type="LC_Broadleaved">
                                    <name>Broadleaved</name>
                                    <description>Describe a Broadleaved type element</description>
                                 </LC_WoodyLeafType>
                              </elements>
                           </LC_WoodyGrowthLeafType>
                           <height max="5.0" min="0.5"/>
                        </LC_LandCoverElement>
                     </elements>
                     <presence_type>Mandatory</presence_type>
                  </LC_Stratum>
               </elements>
            </LC_HorizontalPattern>
         </elements>
      </LC_LandCoverClass>
      <LC_LandCoverClass id="1B" uuid="6ef97580-f65c-11de-b401-e06995627ffe" xsi:type="LC_LandCoverClass">
         <name>Mangrove</name>
         <description>Describe the land cover class</description>
         <map_code>22</map_code>
         <elements>
            <LC_HorizontalPattern id="1C" uuid="80628d20-f65c-11de-b401-e06995627ffe" xsi:type="LC_HorizontalPattern">
               <name>Horizontal Pattern 1</name>
               <description>Describe the horizontal pattern</description>
               <elements>
                  <LC_Stratum id="1D" ontop="0" uuid="863e2f60-f65c-11de-b401-e06995627ffe" xsi:type="LC_Stratum">
                     <name>Stratum1</name>
                     <description>Vegetation</description>
                     <elements>
                        <LC_LandCoverElement id="1E" uuid="a4fcd230-f65c-11de-b401-e06995627ffe" xsi:type="LC_Trees">
                           <name>Trees</name>
                           <description>Describe a vegetation element of trees type</description>
                           <presence_type>Mandatory</presence_type>
                           <portioning max="100.0" min="100.0"/>
                           <cover max="80.0" min="60.0"/>
                           <LC_WoodyGrowthLeafPhenology id="21" uuid="e3aec874-3572-11de-a238-000cf147c442" xsi:type="LC_WoodyGrowthLeafPhenology">
                              <name>Woody Growth Leaf Phenology</name>
                              <description>Contains the elements of Woody Growth Leaf Phenology</description>

<LC_Legend xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" id="1" lccs_sort="1" uuid="f33d9382-e9cb-11e5-890c-780cb82883be" xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation="LC2015_33_class.xsd" xsi:type="LC_Legend">
   <name>BD LCCS Legend-VER5</name>
   <description>Bangladesh National Land Cover Legend</description>
   <elements>
      <LC_LandCoverClass id="151" uuid="344cdf13-ec75-11e5-b6f5-780cb82883be" xsi:type="LC_LandCoverClass">
         <name>Hill Forest</name>
         <description>Describe the land cover class</description>
         <map_code>FH</map_code>
         <elements>
            <LC_Characteristic id="37F" uuid="6cb7e220-8c1f-11e0-82ab-000cf147c442" xsi:type="LC_GeographicalAspects">
               <name>Geographical Aspects</name>
               <description>Describe the geographical aspects</description>
               <type>Located in Mountainous Tracts</type>
            </LC_Characteristic>
            <LC_Characteristic id="152" uuid="b0a53ef5-50f6-11de-bcd7-000cf147c442" xsi:type="LC_TopographicalAspects">
               <name>Topographical Aspects</name>
               <description>Describe the topographical aspects</description>
               <altitude max="1100.0" min="200.0"/>
            </LC_Characteristic>
            <LC_Characteristic id="2DD" uuid="b0a53ef8-50f6-11de-bcd7-000cf147c442" xsi:type="LC_UnconsolidatedSurfaceCharacteristics">

                     <name>Stratum 1</name>
                     <description>Vegetation 1</description>
                     <elements>
                        <LC_LandCoverElement id="155" uuid="344cdf10-ec75-11e5-b6f5-780cb82883be" xsi:type="LC_Trees">
                           <name>Trees</name>
                           <description>Describe a vegetation element of trees type</description>
                           <elements>
                              <LC_Characteristic id="202" uuid="27a47295-43af-11de-bbd4-000cf147c442" xsi:type="LC_FloristicAspect">

                                 <description>Describe the floristic aspect</description>
                                 <elements>

                                       <name>Floristic Aspect Species</name>
                                       <description>Describe the floristic aspect species</description>
                                       <species_name>Chapalish, Dipterocarps species, Koroi, Jarul, Gamar etc</species_name>
                                    </LC_Characteristic>
                                 </elements>
                              </LC_Characteristic>
                              <LC_Characteristic id="156" uuid="27a47286-43af-11de-bbd4-000cf147c442" xsi:type="LC_NaturalOrSeminaturalVegetation">
                                 <name>Natural Or Seminatural Vegetation</name>
                                 <description>Describe the natural or seminatural vegetation</description>
                              </LC_Characteristic>
                           </elements>
                           <presence_type>Mandatory</presence_type>
                           <cover max="100.0" min="10.0"/>
                           <LC_WoodyGrowthLeafPhenology id="1EA" uuid="e3aec874-3572-11de-a238-000cf147c442" xsi:type="LC_WoodyGrowthLeafPhenology">
                              <name>Woody Growth Leaf Phenology</name>
                              <description>Contains the elements of Woody Growth Leaf Phenology</description>
                              <elements>
                                 <LC_WoodyLeafPhenology id="1EB" uuid="38e4e9f0-63b7-11e6-949f-28e3478d86fa" xsi:type="LC_Evergreen">
                                    <name>Evergreen</name>
                                    <description>Describe an Evergreen leaf phenology element</description>
                                 </LC_WoodyLeafPhenology>
                                 <LC_WoodyLeafPhenology id="3DF" uuid="eea6da80-a346-11e7-b17f-5cf9dd742a27" xsi:type="LC_Deciduous">
                                    <name>Deciduous</name>
                                    <description>Describe a Deciduous leaf phenology element</description>
                                 </LC_WoodyLeafPhenology>
                              </elements>
                           </LC_WoodyGrowthLeafPhenology>

                                 </LC_WoodyLeafType>
                              </elements>
                           </LC_WoodyGrowthLeafType>

                              </LC_Characteristic>

                                 <elements>

                                       <type>Regular</type>

                                    <name>Evergreen</name>
                                    <description>Describe an Evergreen leaf phenology element</description>
                                 </LC_WoodyLeafPhenology>
                              </elements>
                           </LC_WoodyGrowthLeafPhenology>
                           <LC_WoodyGrowthLeafType id="225" uuid="e3aec875-3572-11de-a238-000cf147c442" xsi:type="LC_WoodyGrowthLeafType">
